T04sanss03u:24: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T04sanss03u:31: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyetâiva hi //
T04sanss03u:34: dānais tathâpi satkāraiḥ paripācyêha tān narān /
T04sanss03u:39: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca /
T04sanss03u:41: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca /
T04sanss03u:43: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
T04sanss03u:45: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /
T04sanss03u:50: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ /
T04sanss03u:51: ete dharmā na câsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana //
T04sanss03u:52: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ /
T04sanss03u:55: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam //
T04sanss03u:57: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot //
T04sanss03u:70: ye câpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /
T04sanss03u:72: adhimānīn na seveta [[DOUBT]] vinayec câgame sthitān /
T04sanss03u:76: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet /
T04sanss03u:77: kuleṣu câpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet //
T04sanss03u:78: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [[DOUBT]] /
T04sanss03u:80: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ /
T04sanss03u:81: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cânye tādṛśā janāḥ //
T04sanss03u:83: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cânye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
T04sanss03u:85: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
T04sanss03u:86: na câikaḥ praviśet tatra nâpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
T04sanss03u:87: ayaṃ câparo 'nartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmôktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
T04sanss03u:88: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyâciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyântike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
T04sanss03u:90: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
T04sanss03u:91: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ
T04sanss03u:92: pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
T04sanss03u:96: apy eva nāmâyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā
T04sanss03u:102: na vayam atrâsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyâsanāt
T04sanss03u:110: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyatîmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.ṃ dharmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati
T04sanss03u:114: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako mahêccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpêcchêti neyaṃ /
T04sanss03u:115: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmêty uktaṃ //
T04sanss03u:123: so 'lpârthatayâlpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca
T04sanss03u:124: bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca
T04sanss03u:127: kathhye vârthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate /
T04sanss03u:134: sa tatra nâtmârthāya pratipanno bhavati na parârthāya /
T04sanss03u:139: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt
T04sanss03u:144: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet
T04sanss03u:145: tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti
T04sanss03u:147: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin
T04sanss03u:151: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair anuttarāṃ sa-
T04sanss03u:154: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
T04sanss03u:156: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate
T04sanss03u:162: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārâṅkuśâviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
T04sanss03u:163: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam anadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍâiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārâṅkuśêti
T04sanss03u:167: tathā cârabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
T04sanss03u:172: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmârambho 'tivelāyāṃ vâparipakvâdhimukter vā duṣkarakarmârambhas tad yathā
T04sanss03u:176: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena
T04sanss03u:180: nâpy akālêty ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva nôtpādyâbhyāsânārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
T04sanss03u:181: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svârthaghātibhyaḥ piśitâśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś câtmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ
T04sanss03u:187: kathaṃ ca kulaputrâtra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihārôpāyakuśalo bhavati /
T04sanss03u:191: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjôpasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
T04sanss03u:192: ye cânye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgântarāyikās tān sarveṇa
T04sanss03u:203: tena ca kulaputrâitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nâvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam
T04sanss03u:205: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmâdidhātuṃ āsravanti
T04sanss03u:208: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py anarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
T04sanss03u:209: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
T04sanss03u:215: ca satvānām avarṇâyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nâdhyāyâśayenêti asya vivarjanam atrôktaṃ /
T04sanss03u:216: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu
T04sanss03u:220: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
T04sanss03u:223: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām
T04sanss03u:226: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
T04sanss03u:234: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
T04sanss03u:235: svapnântare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ //
T04sanss03u:238: samādāyêti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
T04sanss03u:240: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati //
T04sanss03u:251: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu
T04sanss03u:254: tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehîti //
T04sanss03u:258: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś câdīptaśiraścailôpamena bahūn kalpān /
T04sanss03u:260: tan nâham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ //
T04sanss03u:267: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye
T04sanss03u:268: sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvârambaṇena vīryeṇa yathâham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti //
T04sanss03u:270: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣûdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt
T04sanss03u:274: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti //
T04sanss03u:277: yasyâdhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
T04sanss03u:278: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya //
T04sanss03u:279: sêtaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
T04sanss03u:280: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham //
T04sanss03u:283: tatra tathāgatâiva sākṣîti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
T04sanss03u:290: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ
T04sanss03u:295: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
T04sanss03u:296: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
T04sanss03u:298: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sâraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena
T04sanss03u:304: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇânulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
T04sanss03u:305: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogâcārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe
T04sanss03u:312: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dāta-
T04sanss03u:319: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena câsya bhavitavyaṃ //
T04sanss03u:322: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
T04sanss03u:323: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena
T04sanss03u:326: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābhôtsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham
T04sanss03u:329: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā
T04sanss03u:331: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
T04sanss03u:332: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
T04sanss03u:334: yā staupikântaśâikadaśâpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
T04sanss03u:338: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe
T04sanss03u:340: tat tatrâiva tathāgatacaitye vātâtapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
T04sanss03u:341: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss03u:342: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nâpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ
T04sanss03u:345: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca
T04sanss03u:351: sa tenâkuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrâsyôpapattir bhavati /
T04sanss03u:356: tasya tatra jihvêndriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni
T04sanss03u:358: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatâgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālânukālaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss03u:361: sa tenâkuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrâsyôpapattir bhavati /
T04sanss03u:363: sôdvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
T04sanss03u:364: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇâpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī
T04sanss03u:366: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ-
T04sanss03u:368: bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ vêti //
T04sanss03u:370: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyâkārāṃs te
T04sanss03u:374: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhâkārāṃs te
T04sanss03u:378: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣâkārān patrâkārān
T04sanss03u:384: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjany-ākā-
T04sanss03u:387: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭâkāraṃ sa śrāmaṇerakâsīt /
T04sanss03u:390: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya
T04sanss03u:393: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
T04sanss03u:394: te vṛttā velêti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ
T04sanss03u:396: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukâkāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ //
T04sanss03u:397: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalâkāraṃ so 'pi
T04sanss03u:401: sa tenôktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitvêti /
T04sanss03u:403: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā
T04sanss03u:407: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evâham
T04sanss03u:412: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam
T04sanss03u:417: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
T04sanss03u:420: yady apy evaṃ tathâpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat
T04sanss03u:425: apy eva nāmâitat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
T04sanss03u:432: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyâkārāḥ
T04sanss03u:434: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryâbhibhūtena
T04sanss03u:437: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
T04sanss03u:438: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati //
